name: Sanctuary (Stephan Gimenez)
description:
Sanctuary - Global Game Jam 2019 - Site: Epitech Marseille France 

-o-0-o-

-o-0-o-

In Sanctuary, you play a homeless and lost soul looking for shelter. Maybe you should enter this welcoming (creepy?) temple?

Controls: Third person, WASD + mouse

Current state: unfinished.

Asset used (not done during the jam): Music by Frank De Pablos

Tools:

Powered by UE4.22

Daz 3D and Cinema 4D for 3D assets

The Gimp for screenshots editing

(Most of the team had never used UE4 before, kudos to them! :D - - Stephan)

Credits:
